label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_027
content:
## 2026-01-29 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /zone-transfers: REQUESTS 40 | p50: 675ms p95: 1705ms p99: N/A | err: 5.0% (2 errors) | success: 95.0%
- /ixfr-requests: REQUESTS 230 | p50: 675ms p95: 1705ms p99: N/A | err: 1.7% (4 errors) | success: 98.3%
- /dns-queries: REQUESTS 25700 | p50: N/A | p95: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /propagation: REQUESTS N/A | p50: 92ms p95: 250ms | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /dnssec-signing: REQUESTS N/A | p50: N/A | p95: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /health-checks: REQUESTS N/A | p50: N/A | p95: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /change-requests: REQUESTS 7 | changes applied: 6 | failed: 1 | mean apply time: 31min

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 46% | Mem 68% | Disk 81% | Conns: 1468 | Net: 120/165 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 34% | Mem 59% | Disk 60% | Conns: 1310 | Net: 95/110 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 70% | Mem 82% | Disk 57% | Conns: N/A | Net: 150/195 Mbps
- signer-01: CPU 54% | Mem 81% | Disk 67% | Conns: N/A | Net: 24/28 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- cloud-dns-sync-01: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion N/A | max N/A | avg_wait N/A
- signer-01: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion N/A | max N/A | avg_wait N/A

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 86.5% | Bandwidth: N/A Gbps | Origin requests: N/A

### Alerts
- [WARNING] TSIG failures on hostname: 4 events
- [INFO] Propagation delay: 92ms avg | 250ms p95
- [ERROR] Change request failure: 1 in batch
- [INFO] Propagation sites: 36
- [WARNING] Stale answer percentage: 1.0%
- [ERROR] TTL rollback executed after spike
- [WARNING] Dynamic updates spike due to misconfigured client; queue depth reached 12
- [ERROR] Transfer failures linked to TSIG issues; mitigated by staggering transfers

### Deployments & Changes
- Split failed change set into smaller batches and re-applied
- Corrected internal client misconfiguration causing update spike
- Rolled back TTL reduction from 60s to 180s after stale answer increase
- Mitigated TSIG failures by staggering transfer parallelism

### Events
- Dynamic updates spiked due to internal client misconfiguration; propagation p95 rose, sync queue depth reached 12
- One change set failed after exceeding per-zone change batch limit; split into smaller batches and re-applied
- TSIG failures correlated with increased transfer volume; confirmed keys correct, mitigated by staggering transfers
- Rolled back TTL reduction (180->60) after stale answers increased during update spike; restored to 1800

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: O. Bennett. 4 pages. 10 tickets. Status: Degraded during dynamic update spike; mitigated by batching, staggering transfers, and correcting client behavior
